title: Prismacolor 14171 Premier Fine Line Illustration Markers, Assorted Fine Tips, Black, 5-Count
description: Draw perfectly precise details and create razor-sharp outlines with Prismacolor Premier Fine Line Illustration Markers. Your Prismacolor art markers come in 5 different tip sizes to help you draw the right marks for every task. The deeply saturated, alcohol-based, acid-free ink is remarkably lightfast to resist fading. Prismacolor art pens help bring your artistic vision to life.
